name: AYJET Anatolian Stars FTO Flight School
about: AYJET Anatolian Stars FTO Flight School, located in Istanbul, Turkey, is an aviation school founded by experienced captain pilots from the Turkish Air Force and airline companies. The school offers a comprehensive range of flight training programs, including Private Pilot Licenses (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licenses (CPL), Airline Transport Pilot Licenses (ATPL), and Multi-Crew Pilot Licenses (MPL). AYJET operates a state-of-the-art fleet of Diamond DA-20, Sonaca S201, Zlin L242, and Diamond DA-42 aircraft, along with advanced simulators. With a strong emphasis on safety, AYJET maintains its own SHY-145 Maintenance Organization and adheres to strict national and international aviation standards. The school collaborates with major airlines such as Turkish Airlines, SunExpress, and Pegasus Airlines, ensuring its graduates are highly sought after in the industry. AYJET is committed to providing top-tier education and career pathways for aspiring pilots.
services: ["Modular ATPL(A) Frozen Training Course\nATPL(A) Integrated Training Course\nMPL Integrated Training Course"]
